title: GRAPHITE–TY
description: Where every stroke tells a story, unlock the creativity within and unleash your vision. Sketch your way to glory ‘cause the canvas is calling for a creative masterpiece.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: This event has four consecutive rounds: Round 1 (Speed Round), Round 2 (Blindfold Challenge), Round 3 (Induvidual Art)
No reference are allowed, organizers will be providing the reference for the 1st and 2nd rounds
Only graphite pencils and charcoals are allowed as drawing mediums.
Participants should bring their own materials.
Drawing sheets will be provided by the event organizers.
Create a dynamic graffiti piece within a limited time frame of 10 minutes.
Participants start with a blank canvas and must finish within the specified time.
Judging Criteria will be based on Creativity, effective use of time, and overall visual impact.
Create a visually impactful graffiti piece whileblindfolded.reference will be displayed only for 1 min.
Participants wear blindfolds for a specified duration of 5 mins, then can remove them to fine-tune their artwork for the next 10 mins. No eraser should be used.
Judging criteria will be based on adaptability, creativity, and overall impact of the blindfold segment.
